metadata.title: CVE-2018-14671 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In ClickHouse before 18.10.3, unixODBC allowed loading arbitrary sharedobjects from the file system which led to a Remote Code Executionvulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14671` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

clickhouse-client - 18.16.1+ds-7
clickhouse-common - 18.16.1+ds-7
clickhouse-server - 18.16.1+ds-7
clickhouse-tools - 18.16.1+ds-7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: clickhouse package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '18.16.1+ds-7').
